Articles.Content:
I was wondering if there was an alternate mod that uses the same model and source code, as it's outdated and doesn't work ingame.

Edited June 8, 2014 by fafeman
You might have installed it wrong, because I'm using it and it works almost perfectly.
Hm, I'll try to do another reinstall, and see if I did it wrong.

make sure you have DYJlibrary.dll. That is what runs the GAU-19 in that mod. You only need one DYJlibrary.dll file, if you have Pwings you may have 2 of them and they are conflicting.

Also it is not added to the tech tree so if you are trying to find it in Career mode it wont be there until you add it to the tech tree in the cfg file.
Yeah, I have 1 DYJlibrary.dll, and I installed the mod to the game's source folder, with the DYJlibrary.dll in the GameData. Do I need it in the source folder?

Yeah, I have 1 DYJlibrary.dll, and I installed the mod to the game's source folder, with the DYJlibrary.dll in the GameData. Do I need it in the source folder?

I left mine where it should be in the DYJmisc file in your Gamedata folder.
Yeah, that works, thanks. I was using version 0.1, not 0.4, from the thread.
It has never worked for me, even when it was supposed to. I used Skillful instead.
